Address.value: 3 GARRET MOUNTAIN PLAZA SUITE 401, WOODLAND PARK, New Jersey, 7424, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Anterix Inc is a United States-based company engaged in delivering broadband needed to modernize infrastructure for energy, transportation, logistics, and other industries. It offers Private LTE for utilities which help to automate processes, monitor environmental conditions, enable artificial intelligence, and drive productivity.
